snippet: Caster Semenya will carry South Africa’s flag at the opening ceremony of the London Olympics.
abstract: South African runner Caster Semenya will carry the country's flag at the opening ceremony of the London Olympics, three years after the track star was embroiled in a gender-test controversy that threatened her career and sidelined her from competition for nearly a year.
lead_paragraph: Caster Semenya will carry South Africa’s flag at the opening ceremony of the London Olympics.

headline.seo: Caster Semenya to Carry South Africa’s Flag at Olympics
headline.main: Semenya to Carry South Africa’s Flag at Olympics
